name: SBStudio II Sound File
summary: Learn about .SOU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SOU files act as containers for raw sound data used in music compositions and sound effects. The files are similar to .PAC files, which SBStudio also uses, but SOU files store only audio data, not additional project information.

Musicians and hobbyists used SOU files to build instrument samples and arrange tracks within SBStudio II's modular music environment. Because SBStudio II is an older program, SOU files are now primarily found in archived projects or collections of legacy audio tools.

description: A SOU file is an audio file created by SBStudio II, a sound editing and music sequencing program for DOS. It stores audio data in a block-based format that SBStudio uses to organize and play back sampled sounds. SOU files are proprietary to SBStudio and are not meant to be played directly in standard media players.

instructions: You can open SOU files with FMJ-Software Awave Studio in Windows. SBStudio II also supports SOU files, but it is discontinued.
